Name: Spring Cloud Function SpEL Code Injection
Synopsis: The remote Spring Cloud Function is vulnerable to code injection.
Description: The version of Spring Cloud Function installed on the remote host is prior to 3.1.7 or 3.2.3. It is therefore affected by a code injection vulnerability.
Solution: Upgrade to Spring Cloud Function version 3.1.7 / 3.2.3 or later.

Name: Apache Log4j < 2.15.0 Remote Code Execution
Synopsis: The remote Apache Log4j is vulnerable to remote code execution.
Description: The version of Apache Log4j on the remote host is prior to 2.15.0. It is therefore affected by a remote code execution vulnerability.
Solution: Upgrade to Apache Log4j version 2.15.0 or later.

Name: Progress MOVEit Transfer SQL Injection
Synopsis: The remote MOVEit Transfer is vulnerable to SQL injection.
Description: The version of Progress MOVEit Transfer installed on the remote host is affected by a SQL injection vulnerability.
Solution: Apply the security update provided by the vendor.

Name: Adobe Commerce and Magento Open Source Improper Input Validation
Synopsis: The remote Adobe Commerce installation is vulnerable to improper input validation.
Description: The version of Adobe Commerce installed on the remote host is affected by an improper input validation vulnerability.
Solution: Upgrade to the latest version of Adobe Commerce.

Name: Jenkins CLI Arbitrary File Read
Synopsis: The remote Jenkins installation is vulnerable to arbitrary file read.
Description: The version of Jenkins installed on the remote host is prior to 2.442 and is therefore affected by an arbitrary file read vulnerability.
Solution: Upgrade to Jenkins version 2.442 or later.
